DOC.brief_title: Pharmaceutical Care for Asthma Control Improvement (PHARMACI)-Study
DOC.detailed_description: The objective of this study is to evaluate the therapeutic effectiveness and cost-effectivity of pharmaceutical care for asthma patients. Patients will be randomly allocated to the control group (= no input from pharmacist) or intervention group (= with pharmaceutical care at baseline and follow-up visits over 6 months).
DOC.criteria: Patients with persistent asthma Asthma treatment for at least 12 months Regular visitors of the participating community pharmacy Severe comorbidity > 10 packyears smoking history Asthma Control Test score < 15 or =25
